name: Squirrel Squire
description:
The modifications that I created for this game are a fully functional second Level, a custom made gate with its own animation, signs on the first level that tell the player how to play the game, custom sound effects, custom title screen art, a victory screen, and a level select screen.

Wolverine Title Screen Picture: https://www.worldatlas.com/articles/wolverine-facts-animals-of-north-america.htm...

Squirrel Title Screen Picture: https://kids.nationalgeographic.com/animals/mammals/facts/eastern-gray-squirrel

Bush Title Screen Picture: https://www.istockphoto.com/photos/green-bush
